tweet: Earlier this week, I had the opportunity to speak at the Western Economic Council Breakfast about how our economy continues to grow and create #jobs thanks to #taxreform. I will continue to work with my colleagues on common-sense solutions to strengthen our economy. pic.twitter.com/0dFYTS3tWx

It was great to meet the new Base Commander at #JSMC in #Lima this week & discuss how I can further help them carry out their critical mission & achieve our national security objectives. I’ve long advocated for this plant & workers & I'll continue to support their mission. #Ohio

During my conversations with students at @DelawareAreaCC earlier this week we discussed the importance of strengthening #CTE programs & making them affordable for students so they can develop the skills they need to get the #jobs available today. My #JOBSAct will help. pic.twitter.com/pw56r8H2nn

It’s important for all #Ohioans who suffered damage from the #MemorialDay storms to register for #FEMA aid. The deadline to apply is this coming Tuesday, Sept 3. #Ohioans can apply online,  http://disasterassistance.gov  or by calling 1800-621-3362

I enjoyed visiting & touring a YouthBuild site in #Cincinnati earlier this week. I was very impressed with the work these young men were doing to renovate an Evanston home. @EastersealsGC is a great program & I’m proud of their important mission to help these young adults. pic.twitter.com/it4U7k5aZG
http://www.sanduskyregister.com/story/201908220016 …

In #Ohio, we have a rich history of pushing the boundaries of flight. For more than a century, #Ohio has led the way in flight & space travel. @NASA_Plum_Brook & @NasaGlenn are building on that proud heritage as we prepare for mankind’s next great voyage to the stars.
While some of my bipartisan bills are now law, there’s more work to do & I will continue to work to help #Ohio from the federal level. #EndOverdose #CARA #STOP #CURES
Today begins International Overdose Awareness Week. I’ve worked in the #Senate to craft legislation to combat the #opioidcrisis that has devastated our communities.

As I said to the @washingtonpost, @USPS must follow the law & screen all #Chinese packages coming into the US as laid out in my bipartisan #STOPAct. https://www.washingtonpost.com/investigations/2019/08/23/fentanyl-flowed-through-us-postal-service-vehicles-crossing-southern-border/?noredirect=on …

Proud of the efforts made by federal & VA law enforcement in seizing more than 30 kg of fentanyl, 30 kg of heroin, five kg of cocaine & more than $700,000. As this @CBSNews story notes, that amount of fentanyl is enough to kill 14 million people. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/fentanyl-drug-bust-investigators-seize-enough-fentanyl-to-kill-14-million-people-in-massive-bust/ …
Thanks for having me yesterday! I’m grateful for all that the @180thFW does for our country & for #Ohio. https://twitter.com/180thFW/status/1167465288251707398 …

I enjoyed visiting the Joint Systems Manufacturing Center in #Lima yesterday and was excited to see the hard work that goes into making the Abrams Tanks and Stryker Vehicles, which keep our men & women in uniform safe. More on my trip from @LimaYNN: https://www.hometownstations.com/news/senator-rob-portman-visits-jsmc-for-his-results-tour/article_563d4736-caa7-11e9-920d-67a63ddadf8f.html …

In order to protect our nation it’s critical that the @180thFW has the resources it needs. I was proud to help secure funding to replace outdated hangars so that the men & women serving our country in #Toledo will be able to better perform their critical national security mission pic.twitter.com/XpXPE035eb

I had a chance to meet today with some of our Airmen of the @180thFW who are carrying out one of our nation’s most important homeland defense missions: protecting our skies through the Aerospace Control Alert. pic.twitter.com/4p05zvrPL4

The project I saw today uses cutting-edge conservation practices to improve water quality and reduce nutrient runoff, & it is incredibly important to the #GreatLakes. The #GLRI is critical to #Ohio’s fishing industry, our tourism industry, & the drinking water of 3M #Ohioans. pic.twitter.com/4XnIwqTBzg

The Soil & Water Districts in Defiance and Putnam Counties are great examples of how #GLRI funds are being used to improve water quality in the region while supporting sustainable farming practices, and I want to thank Bill Oedy for the tour of his farm. pic.twitter.com/5GlLJOT1wr

I have met President Zelensky, who is a pro-America reformer. He has the potential to be one of America’s strongest partners and he needs our support fighting Russian aggression. The security assistance should be transferred to #Ukraine now.

This security assistance provides important lethal & non-lethal assistance to the Ukrainian Armed Forces to help them defend #Ukraine’s sovereignty. Right now this security assistance is being held up by OMB despite strong interagency support &bipartisan backing on Capitol Hill.

I strongly support & have worked to secure continued security assistance to #Ukraine. In June, DoD announced it would transfer $250 million in additional security assistance to help #Ukraine defend its sovereignty from Russian aggression.

#JSMC is increasing production of upgraded Abrams tanks & modernized Stryker vehicles, which will not only strengthen our national security, but benefit #Lima & our local economy as well. pic.twitter.com/gIZyAL1eaC

I’ve long been a strong advocate for both Lima and the Abrams and Stryker programs. I enjoyed visiting today to see #JSMC’s strong & skilled workforce who are truly extraordinary & provide a unique capability to support & strengthen America’s national security. #Ohio pic.twitter.com/O29fBDJX9R
Couldn’t pass up the opportunity to stop into Uptown Market & Café this morning in Putnam County. The service was fantastic! pic.twitter.com/0CAUXUmkXu

Last year I worked w/ @USDOT to protect TRC #Ohio and ensure it has a level playing field when pursuing partnership and funding opportunities. I’ll continue to work with TRC, & the OSU Center for Automotive Research to make sure they achieve their goals. pic.twitter.com/GTca71OSdr

Today at the Transportation Research Center in East Liberty I was pleased to see firsthand how the SMARTCenter will be testing vehicles in a safe & secure real-world environment before the vehicles are used on public roads & highways. #Ohio pic.twitter.com/2WrhsRCqBE

I enjoyed talking to students today at the @DelawareAreaCC about the skills training they are receiving. My bipartisan #JOBSAct will help ensure that skills training is more accessible & affordable for students like the ones I met today. pic.twitter.com/z1BxbYcB6I

During today's ride-along, I had the opportunity to see how the Columbus Fire Department is using the #CARA grant money it was awarded to help save lives. I’ll continue to work w/ local communities across #Ohio to ensure they have the support & resources they need pic.twitter.com/2IIsXdR7Fa

I had a productive meeting today w/ first responders & members of the Columbus Fire Department’s Rapid Response Emergency Addiction and Crisis Team on how the #opioidepidemic is impacting communities in #FranklinCo. pic.twitter.com/L4qLWaujxa

Sad to hear my good friend, @SenatorIsakson, will be retiring at the end of the year. He is much beloved by our colleagues on both sides of the aisle and his presence will be deeply missed. Jane and I continue to keep Dianne & Johnny in our prayers.

I enjoyed my visit this afternoon to Freshwater Fish Farm of #Ohio, the largest fish hatchery in the state! This was my first time visiting this incredible farm and I encourage #Ohioans to check it out! pic.twitter.com/pbqCQc2b55

I enjoyed my tour of Morgal Machine Tool Company & heard about how #taxreform has benefited their business. Throughout my travels around #Ohio I’ve seen firsthand the real, positive difference that #taxreform is making for Ohio families & workers. #jobs pic.twitter.com/VXPr1OVWAu

I had a productive discussion today with members of the Chamber of Greater Springfield and with other local business leaders on how we can better close the skills gap. My bipartisan #JOBSAct will help ensure we make skills training more accessible & affordable for students. pic.twitter.com/EVrvFawmeQ

Today I toured @WrightPattAFB & saw the future location for NASIC’s most recent military construction project for their Foreign Military Exploitation mission, as well as some of the groundbreaking analysis they are doing to keep our skies & country safe from foreign threats. pic.twitter.com/TmcSKGin9e

My bipartisan Second Chance Act has helped change thousands of lives in #Ohio and I’m pleased that we have strengthened this law to ensure programs like Damascus can continue to make a difference for #Ohio & our country. pic.twitter.com/fWZz3UAMc7

Today, I had a productive discussion w/ leadership from Damascus, other local & community leaders,  Second Chance employers & workers about the positive work being done at Damascus to help give folks a second chance and get back on their feet. pic.twitter.com/8IM0pMLXOJ

YouthBuild apprentices, facing various barriers to academic & employment success, refocus their futures by participating in a construction training program while also completing high school, gaining the valuable knowledge they need in order to live up to their God-given potential pic.twitter.com/RT05GWuIGh

I was impressed by what I saw this morning on a tour of the Easterseals YouthBuild site in Cincinnati. The skills that Easterseals is committed to teaching young men & women through their apprenticeship program are vital to these students’ future success & filling in-demand #jobs pic.twitter.com/sdRO86BnCv

As I said this morning, our economy continues to grow & create #jobs but we have more work to do to ensure that all Americans are benefiting. I’ll continue to work w/ my colleagues on common-sense solutions to strengthen our economy. pic.twitter.com/iUFTCD8uub

Enjoyed speaking at the Western Economic Council Breakfast this morning about how #taxreform has helped our economy & how I’m working to promote CTE to ensure our employers have a competitive workforce to meet the demands of today’s economy. pic.twitter.com/4Yc13sH2Vx

Yesterday my staff attended the ribbon cutting for the Faith House at the Field of Hope in #GalliaCounty. This faith-based women’s recovery house aims to combat addiction & serves as a community outreach program. I’m proud of the work they’re doing here. pic.twitter.com/RNdhW0OJsz
A very happy #NationalDogDay to a loyal & loving member of the Portman clan, Huckleberry. He’s a terrific pup who is always willing to lend a helping paw around the house. pic.twitter.com/lnLjWZBmWG

How much longer is @USPS going to allow countries like #China to continue to ship this deadly drug into our communities, & how many more people have to die before they fully implement the #STOPAct? https://www.washingtonpost.com/investigations/2019/08/23/fentanyl-flowed-through-us-postal-service-vehicles-crossing-southern-border/ …

As of last year, my bipartisan #STOPAct requires by law that all packages from foreign countries include tracking data, but the @USPS has still not fully implemented all the safeguards required. I continue to push them to do so.  https://www.washingtonpost.com/investigations/2019/08/23/fentanyl-flowed-through-us-postal-service-vehicles-crossing-southern-border/ …

Worth reading from the @washingtonpost about the continuing issue of fentanyl being shipped into our country from #China via our own postal service. Fentanyl is killing thousands & I’m pushing @USPS to fully implement the #STOPAct ASAP.  https://www.washingtonpost.com/investigations/2019/08/23/fentanyl-flowed-through-us-postal-service-vehicles-crossing-southern-border/ …

I’ve long fought to protect funding at @NASAGlenn and @NASA_Plum_Brook. Both facilities are doing incredibly important work for increasing space exploration as well as bringing #jobs & investment to #Ohio. http://www.sanduskyregister.com/story/201908220016 …

In a recent op-ed for the @sanduskyregistr, I highlighted my visits to @NASAGlenn & @NASA_Plum_Brook last week & discussed the importance of continuing to support @NASA’s critical operations in #Ohio.  http://www.sanduskyregister.com/story/201908220016 …

The Prescription Drug Pricing Reduction Act will help crack down on the high prices of prescription drugs.  Some #Ohioans have to choose between paying their mortgage or rent & being able to afford their prescription medicine. This new bill will help.  https://bit.ly/2Y1t8xP

Protecting the #GreatLakes should be a nonpartisan issue. I consistently work with my colleagues on both sides of the aisle on common-sense legislation to protect the #GreatLakes for generations to come. #Ohio  https://bit.ly/2Zp6iMi

My bipartisan Retirement Security Preservation Act I introduced w/ @SenatorCardin will help safeguard the retirement security of thousands of working families who deserve the ability to accrue benefits under their pension plan as they were promised.  https://bit.ly/2M19v2D

I enjoyed my discussion last week w/ leadership from the Huron County Board of Mental Health & Addiction Services & first responders about how they’re making great use of the nearly $250,000 in federal funding they were awarded to combat addiction in their community. #Ohio pic.twitter.com/mn6end56to

Last week I traveled throughout #Ohio & heard about the thousands of open #jobs across the state. Many of these jobs require skilled workers, which is why we must ensure CTE and community college programs are affordable & accessible. My bipartisan #JOBSAct will help. pic.twitter.com/wCMpDvyt5J

Happy 103rd birthday to the @NatlParkService! Today all #natlparks have free admission, including one of my personal favorites, Cuyahoga Valley National Park in #Ohio. Love to visit this special place w/ my family & my Restore Our Parks Act will ensure future generations can too. pic.twitter.com/NcqAmI3MhD

Too often, drugs are used to coerce victims of human trafficking. As a leader in the #Senate to combat human trafficking, I reintroduced the bipartisan #ProtectAct w/ @SenSherrodBrown to better equip law enforcement to bring human traffickers to justice  https://bit.ly/30TeFRk
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1DHofadft1c&feature=youtu.be … #CARA #CURES #STOPAct

In #Ohio, overdose deaths attributed to fentanyl, cocaine & meth have increased dramatically. We’ve made real progress in combating opioid overdoses, thanks in part to legislation I’ve helped to enact, but we must keep addressing the broader issue of addiction.

The #GreatLakes provide drinking water for 40 million people, contribute $10 billion in tourism each year, and support hundreds of thousands of #jobs across the region. I’ll continue to lead efforts to protect #LakeErie & all of our #GreatLakes.  https://bit.ly/2Zp6iMi

Tomorrow in honor of their 103rd birthday, the @NatlParkService is offering free admission to all national parks. #Ohioans can take this opportunity to visit any of the 8 #NPS sites in #Ohio including the beautiful Cuyahoga Valley National Park. @CVNPNPS
Thank goodness we were successful bc the restored testing & space stimulation equipment are badly needed now as the Artemis project is about to go to the moon - then Mars. pic.twitter.com/MoFI2OliDV

The @NASA_Plum_Brook Station in Sandusky, #Ohio has the most advanced testing in the world for space exploration. Over the past decade I have worked to ensure the funding was there to restore the aging facilities. pic.twitter.com/cpX6SruHrJ
I enjoyed seeing the amazing work they’re doing earlier this week. pic.twitter.com/0FecBRtcbg

I’ve fought successfully over the years to protect the @NASAGlenn Research Center in #Ohio including helping to preserve the Solar Electric Propulsion program which is now so important for @NASA’s deep space exploration missions. pic.twitter.com/YdxDUgCL7z

Rebuilding our aging infrastructure will strengthen our economy, create #jobs, & boost wages. My bipartisan legislation will build on my efforts to improve the federal permitting process, making it easier to finish projects & create #jobs.  https://bit.ly/2K6byPw

I applaud @POTUS for signing into law @SenatorCarper & my bipartisan #CASESAct which will make it easier for #Ohioans & all Americans to interact with their govt when they need help, while also helping members of #Congress better serve their constituents.  https://bit.ly/30uoVjn

Billions in deferred maintenance projects at our #NationalParks can result in compounding effects down the road, a faulty part of a bridge could ultimately result in the bridge collapsing. My Restore Our Parks Act will help preserve our #NatlParks so future generations can visit.

Good read from the @sanduskyregistr regarding my visit to @NASAGlenn and @NASA_Plum_Brook earlier this week. These two stations will prove critical in getting the next man & first woman to the moon in the next 5 years & I’m proud to support these important stations.

Great news from @springfieldnews, for the first time in decades @WrightPattAFB now employs more than 30,000 people & is growing! Last week I toured SE #Ohio & heard from @SouthernStateCC, @HockingCollege, & @EasternGateway Community College about how my bipartisan #JOBSAct will help students get the skills training they need to find in demand #jobs.

My bipartisan #JOBSAct is one of my top legislative priorities this year because low-income students in #Ohio & around our nation deserve the opportunity to develop the skills they need to pursue the #jobs available today. This legislation makes sense. Let’s get it passed.

Good read from @WKYC about my tours of the @NASAGlenn Research Center and @NASA_Plum_Brook for with Administrator @JimBridenstine yesterday. #Ohio has 8 #NationalParks sites  including the Cuyahoga Valley National Park which I just recently visited. Each one has a deferred maintenance backlog & my Restore Our Parks Act will help fund the more than $100 million in needed maintenance projects at these sites.

I introduced the bipartisan Restore Our Parks Act to help address the nearly $12 billion backlog in long-delayed maintenance projects at our #NationalParks by allocating existing revenues the govt already receives from on & offshore energy development

Good read from Gazette Newspapers about my #Ohio north coast tour and my trip to the Ashtabula Port to see the future Petmin Project. This new tech will bring many new #jobs to the area & will be the only US production of its kind.  http://www.gazettenews.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=9318:in-ashtabula-portman-continues-ohio-s-north-coast-tour-highlighting-lake-erie-s-importance-to-ohio-s-economy&catid=45&Itemid=141 …

I’ve introduced legislation to improve the federal permitting process for some of the nation’s largest infrastructure projects & help alleviate some of the unnecessary roadblocks. This is good for #Ohio #jobs, economy, & the environment.  https://bit.ly/2K6byPw

As I said at the Coshocton Port Authority last week, DC must help #Ohio #smallbiz succeed by creating an environment where our economy can grow & #Ohioans can find full-time #jobs. Instead, they are stuck with permitting processes that take far too long.

We need to ensure Ohioans have the skills they need to succeed. Passing the #JOBSAct will make high-quality & rigorous short-term job training programs more affordable by expanding access to Pell Grants for low-income students.

Last week I traveled more than 750 miles in 3 days in Southern & SE #Ohio & participated in workforce development roundtables highlighting my bipartisan #JOBSAct & discussing how best to close the skills gap in our state.

Thank you for your kind words, @ssccpresident Dr. Kevin Boys. It was a pleasure to meet with you last week and I’ll continue to work to get the #JOBSAct passed in order to help ensure Ohioans can get the skills that are needed for today’s in-demand jobs. https://highlandcountypress.com/Content/Opinions/Opinion/Article/Congress-should-pass-Sen-Portman-s-JOBS-Act-/4/22/52132 …

I’ll continue my efforts to ensure #LakeErie, which provide drinking water for 11 million people and supports hundreds of thousands of #jobs, is protected & preserved.  http://www.portman.senate.gov/newsroom/portman-difference/how-senator-portman-has-worked-protect-great-lakes …

As co-chair of the Senate Great Lakes Task Force, I’ve led efforts in Washington to protect #LakeErie. This month, I traveled nearly 700 miles along #Ohio’s north coast to hear from experts & local leaders about what more the federal govt can do to protect our #GreatLakes.
My new legislation helps our communities tackle the new challenges. https://highlandcountypress.com/Content/Opinions/Opinion/Article/Fighting-the-resurgence-of-meth-and-cocaine/4/22/51278 …

I’m encouraged by the progress #Ohio has made in leading the country last year in reducing opioid overdose deaths, but the resurgence of meth & cocaine in our communities demonstrates we must do more to treat the underlying disease of addiction.

When you compare the status quo of #NAFTA, to the new #USMCA, #USMCA is better in every respect for workers, farmers, & service providers in #Ohio and around our country. It’s time for Congress to pass the USMCA to increase American jobs. https://youtu.be/u3aa22fWy_Q

I traveled more than 750 miles over 3 days in SE #Ohio and got good input on how to improve workforce development & close our skills gap. My bipartisan Safe Drinking Water Assistance Act was included in the #Senate passed FY 2020 National Defense Authorization Act. It will provide states with the resources they need to monitor, test, & respond to potential risks posed by emerging contaminants in our drinking water.

This year, I’ve reintroduced the #GreatLakes Fishery Research Authorization (GLFRA) Act to formally authorize the U.S. Geological Survey's (USGS) Great Lakes Science Center, which supports & protects the $7 billion #GreatLakes sport and commercial fishery industry.

Earlier this year, @POTUS signed my bipartisan legislation to again reauthorize HABs & Hypoxia Research and Control Act to help #Ohio communities minimize any economic, ecological, & human health impacts of harmful algal blooms, giving millions of #Ohioans peace of mind.

I’ve led efforts to fully fund the #GLRI & help address the most serious issues that threaten the ecological & economic wellbeing of the #GreatLakes, including invasive species, pollution & toxic contamination. I’ve recently introduced a bill to reauthorize GLRI &increase funding

As co-chair of the Senate #GreatLakes Task Force, I’ve led efforts in the #Senate to protect #LakeErie, which provides drinking water for 11 million people & supports hundreds of thousands of #jobs.  https://bit.ly/2YJ9U01
